version_description: Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixing and Performance Improvements.
This update fixes a bug in our previous release that caused a small number of users to be signed out of their app.
This update fixes a bug in our 2.24 release that caused a small number of users to lose their position in their audiobook.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

At Audible, we’re always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better.

What’s Improved:
• Syncing reliability between your iPhone and Apple Watch

If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible-uk.custhelp.com or on Twitter @audibleuk.

At Audible, we’re always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better.

What’s Improved:
• VoiceOver usability fixes

If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible-uk.custhelp.com or on Twitter @audibleuk.

At Audible, we’re always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better.

What’s Improved:
• We've added additional options for narration speed

Bug Fixes:
• Resuming your book from Bluetooth devices or the lock screen will now resume at the correct position
• Your listening position will now sync correctly between your iOS devices and any Amazon Echo devices you listen on

If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible-uk.custhelp.com or on Twitter @audibleuk.

At Audible, we’re always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better.

What’s Improved:
• Accessibility VoiceOver support has been improved throughout the app

Bug Fixes:
• Fixed an issue where the time remaining in the mini player might show a negative value.
• Books in the library occasionally showed artwork for a different title.

If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible-uk.custhelp.com or on Twitter @audibleuk.

New to the app, a whole new library experience!
• Find titles by listening status: With the new "Titles" feature you can filter your titles to started, not-started & finished. Cloud/Device tabs are simplified to "All" and "Downloaded".
• View titles organized by genres: For those who seek organization without the effort, books are automatically organized by Genre.
• Create your own custom folders/collections: Create folders with unique names and add titles into collections for custom organization
• Favorites: Favorite selections for easy access to your most listened titles; re-listen over and over again

What’s Improved:
• Improvements for our VoiceOver users
• Increased tap area for close button in the Player, making it easier to dismiss

Bug Fixes:
• Theming issues which caused elements to be incorrect color in Dark Mode
• Issue refreshing library for multipart items that could cause downloads to fail
• Mismatch between Control Center skip amount and how much audio is skipped
• Rare crash that could occur when Player was opened at exact moment Sleep Timer ended
• Library failing to refresh on sign in.

We're still trying to track down the cause of the library loading indefinitely in other situations. If you are running into this, please reach out to customer service.

This will be the last version that supports iOS 12. In order to continue getting updates, please upgrade to iOS 13.

If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible-uk.custhelp.com or on Twitter @audibleuk.

At Audible, we’re always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better.

New to the app, a whole new library experience!
• Find titles by listening status: With the new "Titles" feature you can filter your titles to started, not-started & finished. Cloud/Device tabs are simplified to "All" and "Downloaded".
• View titles organized by genres: For those who seek organization without the effort, books are automatically organized by Genre.
• Create your own custom folders/collections: Create folders with unique names and add titles into collections for custom organization
• Favorites: Favorite selections for easy access to your most listened titles; re-listen over and over again

What’s Improved:
• Improvements for our VoiceOver users
• Increased tap area for close button in the Player, making it easier to dismiss

Bug Fixes:
• Theming issues which caused elements to be incorrect color in Dark Mode
• Issue refreshing library for multipart items that could cause downloads to fail
• Mismatch between Control Center skip amount and how much audio is skipped
• Rare crash that could occur when Player was opened at exact moment Sleep Timer ended
• Library failing to refresh on sign in.

We're still trying to track down the cause of the library loading indefinitely in other situations. If you are running into this, please reach out to customer service.

This will be the last version that supports iOS 12. In order to continue getting updates, please upgrade to iOS 13.

If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible-uk.custhelp.com or on Twitter @audibleuk.

At Audible, we’re always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better.

New to the app, a whole new library experience!
• Find titles by listening status: With the new "Titles" feature you can filter your titles to started, not-started & finished. Cloud/Device tabs are simplified to "All" and "Downloaded".
• View titles organized by genres: For those who seek organization without the effort, books are automatically organized by Genre.
• Create your own custom folders/collections: Create folders with unique names and add titles into collections for custom organization
• Favorites: Favorite selections for easy access to your most listened titles; re-listen over and over again

What’s Improved:
• We've made the app faster in a bunch of places

Bug Fixes:
• Collection descriptions won't get cut off anymore
• Rare conditions where narration speed might have been reset to 0 incorrectly

We're still trying to track down the cause of the library loading indefinitely in other situations. If you are running into this, please reach out to customer service. If you have feedback or suggestions, please reach out to us at audible-uk.custhelp.com or on Twitter @audibleuk.

At Audible, we’re always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better.

What's Improved:
• Improvements for our VoiceOver users where time remaining and chapter changed are now clearly spoken
• The categories in Discover support accessibility text sizes
• Network reachability improvements throughout the app

Bug Fixes:
• Fixed an issue where some images on the Homepage appeared incorrectly
• Playback from adding a clip or note occasionally showed an error

If you’re experiencing issues, please reach out to customer service. For feedback or suggestions, contact us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible_com.

What's Improved:
• Apple Watch improvements to player view accessibility and support for complications
• Fixes related to Library Collections
• Various UX improvements including accessibility

Bug Fixes:
• Header alignment in our content modules
• Fixes related to library tab & search bar

If you’re experiencing issues, please reach out to customer service. For feedback or suggestions, contact us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible_com.

What's Updated:
• Introduces continuous listening, an auto-play feature that begins playing something new at the end of your current listen
• Introduces new editorial modules on the app home page
• Improvements to the product details page
• Library scrolling improvements - lenses will now appear when scrolling up
• Bug fixes and stability improvements

If you’re experiencing issues, please reach out to customer service. For feedback or suggestions, contact us at audible.co.uk/help or on Twitter @audibleuk.

What's Improved:
• Podcast pages now show up to 10 podcasts
• Improvements to BMW in-dash integration
• Improved VoiceOver experience in summary shown on the product detail page
• Various UX and accessibility enhancements.

Bug Fixes:
• Fixes an issue where searching for a title would sometimes cause a crash
• Fixes an issue where after syncing titles with watch app, the play button on the Audible app would become unresponsive

If you’re experiencing issues, please reach out to customer service. For feedback or suggestions, contact us at audible.co.uk/help or on Twitter @audibleuk.

At Audible, we’re always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better.

What's Improved:
• Introduces Time Recalculation based on Narration Speed
• Continuous Playback is now available to all customers for podcast episodes
• Text in the library will no longer be truncated when font is set to larger sizes and other accessibility improvements

Bug Fixes:
• Clips and Bookmarks improvements on iPad device
• Bug Fixes related to continuous play and last heard position
• Fixes a crash related to storing duplicate values

If you’re experiencing issues, please reach out to customer service. For feedback or suggestions, contact us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible_com.

At Audible, we’re always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better.

What's Improved:
• Refined Voice over and accessibility experience on multiple screens

Bug Fixes:
• Fixed podcast episode titles on CarPlay
• Fixed an issue where the overflow menu (vertical three dot menu) is not displayed for search results
• Fixed incorrect time remaining issue on the Watch app library screen.
• Fixes a crash that happens when a book is completed on the Apple Watch.

If you’re experiencing issues, please reach out to customer service. For feedback or suggestions, contact us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible_com.

At Audible, we’re always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better.

What's New:
• Continuous play for multi-part books: next portion starts playing automatically upon completion of a book section
• Auto-delete option for Apple Watch users, deletes completed title when user starts next title

Bug Fixes:
• Finished titles no longer appear in the Continue Listening section of Home screen
• Accessibility VoiceOver improvements on Titles screen in Library tab
• Fixed bug that caused sort options view in Library screens to be cut off

If you’re experiencing issues, please reach out to customer service. For feedback or suggestions, contact us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible_com.

At Audible, we’re always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better.

What’s New in Podcasts:
• Save episodes to your Library
• See list of episodes sorted by date added to Audible
• "Next up in your podcasts" available from the home screen
What's New In General:
• Improved Apple Watch file transfer enabling listening before title is completely transferred
• Option to auto download titles to play when offline
• Option to auto remove titles marked as finished
• Ability to share a title from title’s detail page
• Other UX improvements
Bug Fixes:
• Playback improvements for CarPlay
• Accessibility VoiceOver improvements on Search screen
• Multiple crashes fixed when sharing a title, submitting a bug report and other parts of the app

If you’re experiencing issues, please reach out to customer service. For feedback or suggestions, contact us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible_com.

At Audible, we're always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better.

Bug Fixes:
• Search result scrolling and display
• Incorrect plan name showing

If you're experiencing issues, please reach out to customer service. For feedback or suggestions, contact us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible_com.

At Audible, we’re always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better.

What's New:
• We've introduced iOS widgets! You can now quickly access your recent listens right from your home screen.

Bug Fixes:
• Not able to Play/Resume when you follow or unfollow a podcast
• Cropped messaging when purchasing a title in iPad
• Persisting Waze settings toggle
• Sync to watch is now available for downloaded podcast episodes

If you’re experiencing issues, please reach out to customer service. For feedback or suggestions, contact us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible_com.

At Audible, we're always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better.

 Bug Fixes: 
• Collection sort option is now retained when navigating out of the collection and then back
 • Displaying limited subscription purchasing options when navigated from product details page 
• Crash fixes 
• Displaying time remaining in archived titles

If you're experiencing issues, please reach out to customer service. For feedback or suggestions, contact us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible_com.

At Audible, we're always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better.

Bug Fixes:
• Collection sort option is now retained when navigating out of the collection and then back
• Displaying limited subscription purchasing options when navigated from product details page
• Crash fixes
• Displaying time remaining in archived titles

If you're experiencing issues, please reach out to customer service. For feedback or suggestions, contact us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible_com.

What’s improved:

You can now use your credits in the app! Find your next listen in the Audible app and use your credits to add titles to your library. Listening just got easier.
We've made sharing easier by removing extra intermediate steps when sharing titles and providing a share prompt when a screenshot is taken on the player.

Bug Fixes:

Watch icon showing for library titles even when the watch is unpaired
Price missing on extra credit module of Membership Details after making a purchase
Occasional crash when navigating to the product details page
Carousel container resets horizontal position when vertically scrolling past it on App Home and Discover
Titles marked as finished automatically get marked as Unfinished on Refreshing library
Fixes Cancel button not always responding in search
Oldest/ Newest sort options are hidden while sorting

If you’re experiencing issues, please reach out to customer service. For feedback or suggestions, contact us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible_com.

At Audible, we’re always making updates and improvements to make your listening experience better.

Bug Fixes:

Resolved issues when syncing podcasts to Apple Watch
Fixed accessibility issues in setting toggles


If you’re experiencing issues, please reach out to customer service. For feedback or suggestions, contact us at audible.com/help or on Twitter @audible_com.

"Remove from Library" was not working for Podcast episodes
Improved the loading of Featured Content videos
Membership screen was loading prices slightly delayed
